title: $3500-3/2 Hollywood House-Remodeled-Privacy Fenced-Park Boat/RV-Pet Ok
posting_body: ['Three-bedroom, two-bathroom house with a large fenced-in backyard.', 'Lots of windows and natural light in all the rooms.', 'This property is very close to houses of worship, schools, shops, and much more.', 'Minutes to Hard Rock Hotel and Casino.', 'The Master bedroom has a separate entrance and can be used as an separate unit.', 'Pets considered with landlord approval.', 'THIS IS A YEARLY LEASE.', 'Landlord requires First Month, Last Month and Security Deposit to move in (3 month’s rent).', ' Acceptable credit score/report for all persons on the lease (650+), background check and PROOF of income showing sustained combined incomes at least 3 times the amount of the monthly rent.', 'Must have no judgments or money owed to previous landlords.', 'Dianne Warren,', 'show contact info', ', Beachfront Realty.', ' Map view is approximate, not exact, for security reasons.', 'Please CALL to view this property.', ' No texts or emails for first contact.', ' Private owner property.']
